data.name: AceptingOrder
data.value: Accepting Orders Now. Due to overwhelming demands, we are taking preorders on this item for our next shipment. For more information, please call 800-669-9430 or email us.

data.name: HelloBeginSendTracking
data.value: Thank you for shopping with us. We thought you'd like to know that we shipped your items, and that this completes your order. Your order is on its way, and can no longer be changed. Please log on to your account at www.nailsuperstore.com to track your shipment, view your order history or make changes to your account. You can also give us a call at 1-847-260-4000.

data.name: HelloTrackingDelivered
data.value: Thank you for shopping with us. As you can see below, your order has successfully been delivered! This now completes your order. If you have any question about this shipment or manage other orders, please visit Your Orders at Nailsuperstore.com or give us a call at 1-800-669-9430 or 1-847-260-4000.

data.name: HelloTrackingDeliveryException
data.value: Thank you for shopping with us. We are informing you that there was a problem while trying to deliver your package. Please be aware that delivery will be re-attempted the next business day. Please see below for complete details. If you have any question about this or other orders, please visit Your Orders at NailSuperstore.com or give us a call at 1-800-669-9430 or 1-847-260-4000.

data.name: MiniCart_FreeShipUnLogin
data.value: Free Shipping for orders of $99 or more | Info

data.name: PopupCashPoint
data.value:
For every USD$1.00 spent at NailSuperstore.com you\'ll earn 1 \(one\) point. Each point is worth USD$0.05 off on future purchase.

Every time you make a purchase you earn points based on the price of products purchased, shipping fees and taxes are excluded. These points are added and accumulated to your Cash Reward Points balance and available to use after 30 days from invoice date.

Or you can earn 10 points for writing a review on each product which you purchased from us, except free items or product samples.

You can redeem your reward points at checkout. If you have accumulated enough points to redeem then you will have the option of using points as one of the payment methods.

data.name: PopupFlammable
data.value: In compliance with U.S Department of Transportation, IATA laws & regulations, some of your items are required an extra handling fee of $66.25 per shipment (NOT per item) ONLY for international or $42.50 for US express air shipments. No charge for ground shipment to 48 continuous states. Click here for more information.

data.name: ItemFlammable
data.value: In compliance with U.S Department of Transportation, IATA laws & regulations, order with flammable & hazardous material item is required an extra handling fee of $66.25 per shipment (NOT per item) ONLY for international or $42.50 for US express air shipments. No charge for ground shipment to 48 continuous states. Click here for more information.
